name: Dana Point
shortDescription: A picturesque coastal city known for its harbor, beaches, and outdoor water activities.
fullDescription: Dana Point offers stunning ocean views, a vibrant harbor area, and a rich maritime history. Located on the southern coast of Orange County, it‚Äôs a popular destination for boating, surfing, and whale watching. The city features charming neighborhoods, excellent dining, and a laid-back coastal lifestyle that attracts families, retirees, and outdoor enthusiasts alike.

neighborhoods.name: Laguna Niguel
neighborhoods.description: Upscale community with parks, golf courses, and scenic trails.

neighborhoods.name: San Clemente
neighborhoods.description: Coastal city with Spanish-style architecture, beaches, and pier.
neighborhoods.imageAlt: Beach and pier in San Clemente

neighborhoods.name: Mission Viejo
neighborhoods.description: Master-planned community with parks, lakes, and family amenities.

neighborhoods.name: San Juan Capistrano
neighborhoods.description: Historic city known for the Mission and charming downtown.

highlights.title: Dana Point Harbor
highlights.description: Popular marina offering boating, fishing, waterfront dining, and shops.
highlights.bgImageAlt: Boats docked at Dana Point Harbor

highlights.title: Doheny State Beach
highlights.description: Scenic beach with camping, surfing, and picnic facilities.

highlights.title: Whale Watching
highlights.description: Seasonal tours departing from Dana Point to view migrating whales.

highlights.title: Ocean Institute
highlights.description: Educational center focused on marine science and ocean conservation.

faqs.question: What is Dana Point famous for?
faqs.answer: Dana Point is famous for its harbor, whale watching, beaches, and coastal lifestyle.

faqs.question: How are the schools in Dana Point?
faqs.answer: Dana Point is served by the Capistrano Unified School District, known for strong academics.

faqs.question: What outdoor activities are popular?
faqs.answer: Popular activities include boating, surfing, hiking coastal trails, and whale watching.

faqs.question: How is the commute to nearby cities?
faqs.answer: Dana Point offers convenient freeway access to Laguna Beach, Irvine, and other Orange County cities.
